content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-11.5, 18.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -11.5, 18.5), boiler (position -11.5, 25.0), and offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5). The steam engine is currently not connected to a power network and has no input liquid, while the boiler is out of fuel and has no input liquid.

### Copper plate furnace at position(0, 0)
Consists of a stone furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) with coal as fuel. The furnace currently has no ingredients to smelt and is producing copper plates.

### Iron plate furnace at position(5, 5)
Consists of a stone furnace (position 5.0, 5.0) with coal as fuel. The furnace currently has no ingredients to smelt and is producing iron plates.

### Lab at position(unknown)
Consists of a lab (position unknown) that is currently not powered and is set to research automation.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to connect entities. In this case, the agent attempted to connect pipes but lacked the necessary items.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
